title: The Rebirth of the Violent Concubine: The Bright Moon Shields the West Building - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Female Protagonist   Second Chance
author: Mei Guo   Plum Fruit   梅果
description:
In her previous life, Jiang Mingyue—the daughter of the great general—endured blades and shed blood for the sake of the great Yin Dynasty. She lived vigorously and died just as vigorously. With her rebirth, Jiang Mingyue did not want any more trouble. So, she chose Zhao Xilou—the veteran salted fish [1] who is rich and of nobility—as her husband. She was prepared for the Buddhist life [2]—to eat and wait for death [3]! Who would have thought that the power struggles at home, trials and hardships of the country, fights between good and evil, battles between vital energy and pathogeny would come thick and fast [4]?!

[1] Salted fish: a person who has no dreams/goals; an unambitious person
[2] 准备佛系度日 (Buddhist life) : living a life of no desires, sadness or joy; simply calmness and peace of mind
[3] to eat and wait for death: being idle and doing nothing else besides eating
[4] Come thick and fast: arriving one after another, to come continuously>
